metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6228 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description: heap-based buffer overflow in cpStripToTile() in tools/tiffcp.c

notes.Note: alexmurray> libtk-img and povray both seem to have embedded copies of tiff, whilst libgeotiff appears to duplicate the vulnerable function

criterions.comment: libgeotiff package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
libtk-img package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
povray package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
tiff package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
